h3_title: Captain Kalpa-Wave Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: Much of this fight will come down to being constantly mobile to evade the various pools of blood Kalpa-Wave will create, and find times after deflecting his projectiles to run up and unleash damage on the boss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Captain_Kalpa-Wave.md', within the main section titled 'Captain Kalpa-Wave', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Captain Kalpa-Wave' and the sub-subsection 'Captain Kalpa-Wave Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Much of this fight will come down to being constantly mobile to evade the various pools of blood Kalpa-Wave will create, and find times after deflecting his projectiles to run up and unleash damage on the boss.
